name: Carol
description: An energetic girl who is interested in everything and anything. Athletic and has a big brain. Her powers of observation and stamina make her the best scout of the Nightmare Lab.

passiveSkill.name: Street Thug
passiveSkill.description: ${d.lens5.skill ? d.lens5.skill : "For 3 rounds after Carol appears, every attack decreases target's ATK by {placeholder}, lasts 10 seconds; her own ATK in battle increases by {placeholder}."}

uniqueSkill.name: Home Run
uniqueSkill.description: ${d.lens4.skill ? d.lens4.skill : "Hits a miraculous homerun! Carol attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage, stealing 2 [enhance effects] from the target."}

specialSkill.name: Head Bang
specialSkill.description: ${d.lens6.skill ? d.lens6.skill : "Spins, leaps and headbutts from above. Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage, stealing 1 enhancement effect from the enemy.Chance to use skill: {placeholder}"}

normalSkill.name: Collision
normalSkill.description: Carol swings her weapon and slashes at the target. Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage.

templateData.lens4.skill: Hits a miraculous homerun! Carol attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage, stealing 2 [enhance effects] from the target.
templateData.lens5.skill: For 3 rounds after Carol appears, every attack decreases target's ATK by {placeholder}, lasts 10 seconds; her own ATK in battle increases by {placeholder}.
templateData.lens6.skill: Spins, leaps and headbutts from above. Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage, stealing 1 enhancement effect from the enemy.Chance to use skill: {placeholder}
